properties.query:
DeviceRegistryEvents
| where ((RegistryKey contains "\\Dll" or RegistryKey contains "\\$DLL") and (RegistryKey contains "\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Cryptography\\Providers" or RegistryKey contains "\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Cryptography\\OID\\EncodingType" or RegistryKey contains "\\SOFTWARE\\WOW6432Node\\Microsoft\\Cryptography\\Providers" or RegistryKey contains "\\SOFTWARE\\WOW6432Node\\Microsoft\\Cryptography\\OID\\EncodingType")) and (not(((RegistryValueData in~ ("WINTRUST.DLL", "mso.dll")) or (RegistryValueData =~ "C:\\Windows\\System32\\PsfSip.dll" and InitiatingProcessFolderPath =~ "C:\\Windows\\System32\\poqexec.exe" and RegistryKey contains "\\CryptSIPDll"))))

tags.value: Detects when an attacker register a new SIP provider for persistence and defense evasion
